data.eml:eml: On the identity of two species of Proctophyllodidae (Acari: Astigmata: Analgoidea) described by Herbert F. Berla in Brazil, with a description of Lamellodectes gen. nov. and a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hernandes, Fabio A., Valim, Michel P. (2014): On the identity of two species of Proctophyllodidae (Acari: Astigmata: Analgoidea) described by Herbert F. Berla in Brazil, with a description of Lamellodectes gen. nov. and a new species. Zootaxa 3794 (1): 179-200, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3794.1.8
